snippet.title: TRON 2.0 - KILLER APP Mod v1.1a Release Trailer (1080p HD)
snippet.description:
➜ Help keep the LDSO web site online! Buy any game from GreenManGaming via our link: https://greenmangaming.sjv.io/ZQy90R
Killer App Mod v1.1a is an interim release that works better with the Steam version of TRON 2.0, fixes bugs, and restores Multiplayer support in-game on both the CD/DVD and Steam versions.
Download link ➜ http://tronfaq.blogspot.com/2006/02/all-tron-20-files-in-one-place.html#killerappmod

➜ LDSO Web site: http://goo.gl/ZUOfH5
➜ LDSO Twitter: http://goo.gl/CouW5M
➜ LDSO Facebook: http://goo.gl/ay9xHf
➜ LDSO Tumblr: http://goo.gl/nszjUB
➜ LDSO DeviantArt: http://goo.gl/gV1Ujb
➜ TRON 2.0 News: http://goo.gl/4vp6Wz

Note that the mouse cursor being stuck on the screen motionless, is the result of some kind of slight incompatibility between the screen recording software I'm using, and Windows 10.
